downloadTitle: SCOM Management Pack for Microsoft Exchange Server 2013 and above (CTP Release)
downloadDescription: This management pack includes monitors and rules to effectively monitor Exchange Server 2013 and above on its performance, availability, and reliability of its server roles.

downloadFile.name: SC Management Pack for Exchange 2013 and above.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/6/5/1/6513097c-c679-4e20-9cf0-db2dc87adac1/SC Management Pack for Exchange 2013 and above.msi

downloadFile.name: MP Guide for Exchange 2013 and above MP (CTP).docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/6/5/1/6513097c-c679-4e20-9cf0-db2dc87adac1/MP Guide for Exchange 2013 and above MP (CTP).docx

detailsSection:
Overview
    The Microsoft Exchange Server 2013 and above Management Pack provides comprehensive service health information for your Exchange organization.
      The Exchange 2013 Management Pack is engineered for organizations that include servers running Exchange 2013 and above.
detailsSection_file_name: SC Management Pack for Exchange 2013 and above.msi
MP Guide for Exchange 2013 and above MP (CTP).docx
systemRequirementsSection:
You have one of the following versions of System Center Operations Manager deployed:
    • System Center Operations Manager 2016 or later
installInstructionSection: See the MP Guide for detailed instructions.
